title: Episode 103: Erika and Benjamin Sifrit, Natural Born Assholes Mini Morbid
description:
In today's Alaina Mini Morbid, we meet two young lovers who somehow managed to take the film Natural Born Killers as an instructional video. Erika and Benjamin are not your average couple killers, if only for the fact that they didn't have a motive for their crimes. Their only aim was the thrill of the kill. Cold-blooded doesn't even begin to describe these two lizard people.

Sources:
https://mdcoastdispatch.com/2014/10/16/fed-judge-denies-erika-sifrit-appeal-decision-likely-exhausts-challenges/

https://casetext.com/case/sifrit-v-nero

https://www.baltimoresun.com/news/bs-xpm-2003-07-08-0307080192-story.html
